mapper.insert: insert into user(phone, name, id_card, mail, password, sex, role, create_time, update_time) values(#{phone}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{mail},#{password},#{sex}, #{role}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
mapper.select: select * from user where phone = #{phone} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, id_card = #{idCard}, mail = #{mail}, phone = #{phone}, role = #{role} where id = #{id};
